rules_text: [i]Corrupt[/i] – When this creature enters, mill three cards. If you control a permanent with mana value 3 or greater, you may cache a creature card from your graveyard. [i](Exile it and create a Memory enchantment token with “{2}, Sacrifice this: You may play the cached card this turn.”)[/i]
